title: Fix bounding of circle drawing in CellLayerUtils

body: Previously, only the RectangularIsometric case was handled, despite this currently only being used in Rectangular mode. Additionally, the calculation was slightly too tight.

It looks like mountains and cliffs can still devoid the player from playable area Man: Imminent Destruction Seed: 1374698098 Mountain lakes Rotations: 1 Mirror: top left vs bottom right Players per side: 4+ On the seed boosting up players to 10 gets you this It also seems like the seed textfield never yields keyboard focus Though this PR isn't at fault for any of it
